R

Race - Class in hippodrome.actions
Representation of a race, which is done over a RacingTrack.
Race(int, int, int) - Constructor for class hippodrome.actions.Race
Constructs a race with numberOfTracks number of tracks and identification identification.
raceIsOver() - Method in class hippodrome.GeneralInformationRepository
Resets all the statuses of the entities related to a race.
raceIsOver() - Method in interface hippodrome.GeneralInformationRepositoryInterface
 
RACING_TRACK_HOST - Static variable in class configurations.ServerConfigurations
Definition of the Racing Track host for the execution.
RACING_TRACK_NAME - Static variable in class configurations.RMIConfigurations
Name of the Racing Track hippodrome region on RMI Registry.
RACING_TRACK_PORT - Static variable in class configurations.ServerConfigurations
Definition of the Racing Track port for the execution.
RACING_TRACK_TIME_TO_SLEEP - Static variable in class configurations.ServerConfigurations
Definition of the Racing Track time to sleep for the execution.
RacingTrack - Class in hippodrome
Place where the races take place.
RacingTrack(GeneralInformationRepositoryInterface, Race) - Constructor for class hippodrome.RacingTrack
Creates a Racing Track.
RacingTrackInterface - Interface in hippodrome
Interface of the place where the races take place.
rebind(String, Remote) - Method in interface registry.Register
Replaces the binding for the specified name in this registry with the supplied remote reference.
rebind(String, Remote) - Method in class registry.RegisterRemoteObject
Replaces the binding for the specified name in this registry with the supplied remote reference.
Register - Interface in registry
This data type defines the operational interface of a remote object of type RegisterRemoteObject.
RegisterRemoteObject - Class in registry
This data type defines a generic functionality to register remote objects in the local registry service.
RegisterRemoteObject(String, int) - Constructor for class registry.RegisterRemoteObject
Instantiation of a registering object.
registry - package registry
Provides the classes needed to connect and register hippodrome regions along a RMI registry.
relaxABit(int) - Method in class hippodrome.ControlCentre
Relax a bit from the games, as this is could be the final transition of a Spectator lifecycle.
relaxABit(int) - Method in interface hippodrome.ControlCentreInterface
 
reportResults() - Method in class hippodrome.ControlCentre
Signal that the race is over, having the publishing of the results by the Broker performing its job.
reportResults() - Method in interface hippodrome.ControlCentreInterface
 
Response - Class in hippodrome.responses
Class that provides the needed marshalling options to enable the correct return values for each entity's state changes and actual return values.

ResponseType - Enum in hippodrome.responses
Class that provides the encoding to the various type of responses.
